column4: Hi! Does anyone know WLAN-Cards and solving problems? That's wha I am still stuck on Windows...
DWL-G122 Rev. B 1 rt2570
Hi! Does anyone know WLAN-Cards and solving problems? That's wha I am still stuck on Windows...
which card
or chipset, rather
DWL-G122 Rev. B 1 rt2570
chipset rt2570
should work out of the box
that is the rt25xx, no?
yes
and it doesnt work? are you running edgy or what?
I run Dapper 6.06 and I connect with 96% to my AP
so what's wrong
But no datatransfe with WPA
I followed HOWTO under ubuntu
maybe you should try the serial monkey drivers? the ubuntu ones may be bad
I am using  serial monkey drivers
oh wow, so dapper didnt detect it out of the box?
it did but the HOWTO under ubuntu said it doesn't work and freezes the system
then maybe it is a wpasupplicant issue
I don't even use wpasupplicant, since the driver should have with iwpriv
I don't even use wpasupplicant, since the driver should have with iwpriv
i dont know then :/ i've never used iwpriv
